[friendly-captcha-sdk](./friendly-captcha-sdk.md) &gt; [CreateWidgetOptions](./friendly-captcha-sdk.createwidgetoptions.md)

## CreateWidgetOptions interface

Options when creating a widget programmatically.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface CreateWidgetOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [apiEndpoint?](./friendly-captcha-sdk.createwidgetoptions.apiendpoint.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ A custom endpoint from which the agent and widgets are loaded. |
|  [element](./friendly-captcha-sdk.createwidgetoptions.element.md) |  | HTMLElement | The HTML element to mount to, usually this is an element with class <code>.frc-captcha</code>. |
|  [formFieldName?](./friendly-captcha-sdk.createwidgetoptions.formfieldname.md) |  | string &#124; null | _(Optional)_ The name of the field in the form that is set, defaults to <code>frc-captcha-response</code>. |
|  [language?](./friendly-captcha-sdk.createwidgetoptions.language.md) |  | string | <p>_(Optional)_ Language code such as "en" for English or "de" for German. Defaults to automatic language detection.</p><p>Usually you should not set this yourself and instead let the widget detect the language automatically.</p> |
|  [sitekey?](./friendly-captcha-sdk.createwidgetoptions.sitekey.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ Sitekey of your application, starts with <code>FC</code>. |
|  [startMode?](./friendly-captcha-sdk.createwidgetoptions.startmode.md) |  | [StartMode](./friendly-captcha-sdk.startmode.md) | <p>_(Optional)_ The start mode determines the behavior around automatic activation of the widget. Activation here means the challenge gets requested and gets solved. Defaults to <code>&quot;focus&quot;</code>.</p><p>\*<code>&quot;auto&quot;</code>: the widget gets activated as soon as it is created. \* <code>&quot;focus&quot;</code>: the widget gets activated as soon as the form above it is focused. \* <code>&quot;none&quot;</code>: The widget does not start automatically at all, the user needs to press the widget.</p> |
|  [theme?](./friendly-captcha-sdk.createwidgetoptions.theme.md) |  | "light" &#124; "dark" &#124; "auto" | <p>_(Optional)_ The theme for the widget.</p><p>\* <code>&quot;light&quot;</code> (default): a light theme with a white background. \* <code>&quot;dark&quot;</code>: a dark theme with a dark background. \* <code>&quot;auto&quot;</code>: the theme is automatically chosen based on the user's system preferences.</p> |
